mapper.sql: atp.fUuid AS uuid, atp.fAlgorithmTestPlanName AS algorithmTestPlanName, atp.fOperationCombineName AS operationCombineName, atp.fTerminalType AS terminalType, atp.fSearchEngine AS searchEngine, atp.fMachineGroup AS machineGroup, atp.fTestIntervalDay AS testIntervalDay, atp.fTestKeywordCount AS testKeywordCount, atp.fTestkeywordRankBegin AS testkeywordRankBegin, atp.fTestkeywordRankEnd AS testkeywordRankEnd, atp.fOptimizePlanCount AS optimizePlanCount, atp.fStatus AS status, atp.fExecuteQueryTime AS executeQueryTime, atp.fExcuteStatus AS excuteStatus, atp.fCreateBy AS createBy, atp.fCreateTime AS createTime, atp.fUpdateTime AS updateTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_algorithm_test_plan atp
AND atp.fAlgorithmTestPlanName LIKE concat(#{algorithmTestPlanSearchCriteria.algorithmTestPlanName},'%')
AND atp.fOperationCombineName LIKE concat(#{algorithmTestPlanSearchCriteria.operationCombineName},'%')
AND atp.fMachineGroup LIKE concat(#{algorithmTestPlanSearchCriteria.machineGroup},'%')

SELECT FROM t_algorithm_test_plan atp WHERE atp.fstatus = 1 AND (atp.fExcuteStatus= 0 AND (atp.fExecuteQueryTime IS NULL OR atp.fExecuteQueryTime <= DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL fTestIntervalDay-1 DAY)) OR(atp.fExcuteStatus = 1 AND atp.fExecuteQueryTime <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 MINUTE)) )
